Button.default:
// ./src/ui/Button/button.snippet.json
<Button
  ariaLabel="Only when label is not descriptive of the action" // optional
  component="button"
  type="button"
  onClick={() => alert("Required click event")}
  disabled={true} // optional
  iconEnd={<@iconEnd />} // optional
  iconStart={<@iconStart />} // optional
  variant="@variant"
>
  @label
</Button>
Button.permutations:
<Button
  ariaLabel="Only when label is not descriptive of the action" // optional
  component="a"
    href="https://www.example.org"
    onClick={() => alert("Optional click event")} // optional
  component="button"
    type="button"
      onClick={() => alert("Required click event")}
    type="submit"
      onClick={() => alert("Optional click event")} // optional
  disabled={true} // optional
  iconEnd={<@iconEnd />} // optional
  iconStart={<@iconStart />} // optional
  variant="@variant"
>
  @label
</Button>
